RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG
[BITMASK_DEFINITIONS]


Defines

#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_NONE   0x0000
#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_USE_FRUSTUM   0x0001
#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_PERSISTENT   0x0002
#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_STENCIL   0x0004

Detailed Description

------ light source flags ------

Define Documentation

#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_NONE   0x0000

light source has no flags (state unknown)

Version:
0x0100

#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_PERSISTENT   0x0002

keep the light source even after initialization

Version:
0x0100

#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_STENCIL   0x0004

use this definition for the stencil mask of a light source

Version:
0x010C

#define RDB_LIGHT_SOURCE_FLAG_USE_FRUSTUM   0x0001

use frustum information of light source

Version:
0x0100
